attributes.action: ensure that a member of the government is present for the repatriation of each serviceman who arrives back in this country from overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a tangible expression of understanding of the grief and anger felt by the population at the mounting death toll from "wars"overseas would be for the MP from each dead servicepersons consituency to attend the repatriation of that member of the armed forces to RAF Lyneham on each occaision it  occurs,this would bring home the consequences of our actions and provide a visible aknowledgement of the service these brave men and women are doing this country.
